description: Ms. codex. Title from colophon (fol. 220b). Incipit: عن ابى هرون العبدى عن ابى سعيد الخذري قال سمعت رسول الله صلعم غير مرّة ولا مرّتين يقول فى آخر صلوته ... سبحان ربك ربّ العزّة عمّا يصفون ... تفسير سورة ص اخبرنا ابو سعد محمد بن علي الخفّاف Explicit: وقرأت قل هو الله احد وقل اعوذ بربّ الفلق وقل اعوذ بربّ الناس سكن او ذهب وهذا آخر تفسير القرآن المجيد المعروف بالوسيط Physical description: 19 lines per page. Written in medium small taʻlīq in black ink with use of red to overline the commented text. Light cream paper with laid and chain lines visible. Occasional marginal annotations, including excerpts from a Sharḥ al-ṭarīqah al-Muḥammadīyah (see fol. 19a). Waqf (see mention on the upper margin of fol. 2b). Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the upper cover: "2"(?). Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the pastedown of the upper cover: "Ḥāʼ 1355". Inscription in Arabic script in red pencil on fol. 1a: "Tafsīr 62". Collation: Paper, fol. 222 ; 1¹⁰ (-1, before fol. 1) 2-20¹⁰ 21-22⁸ 23⁸ (-1, after fol. 222) ; catchword on the verso of each leaf. Origin: Copy completed on Sunday 5 Muḥarram 895 [Nov. 29, 1489] in Bahnām(?), a village from Wādī ... (?) by Muḥammad ibn ʻUthmān (colophon, fol. 220b).
author: Wāḥidī, Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad, -1075 or 1076
abstract: Third and last part of a copy of Wāḥidī's al-Wasīṭ bayna al-maqbūd wa-al-basīṭ, completed in Rajab 461 [1069] (EI), comprising the commentary of the end of Sūrah 37 to Sūrat al-Nās (114).
extent: 222 leaves: paper ; 290 x 210 (200 x 130) mm. bound to 290 x 220 mm.

title.@value: الجزء الثالث من كتاب الوسيط في تفسير القرآن
al-Juzʼ al-thālith min Kitāb al-Wasīṭ fī tafsīr al-Qurʼān

provenance: From the books of Aḥmad Najīb (ownership statement dated 1289 H. [1872 or 3] on fol. 2a). Ownership statement dated 1216 H. [1801 or 2] in the name of Muḥammad saʻīd ibn Aḥmad, who acquired the volume from ʻUbayd Allāh Efendi al-Bukhārī. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
creator: Wāḥidī, Abū al-Ḥasan ʻAlī ibn Aḥmad, -1075 or 1076
واحدي ، أبو الحسن علي بن احمد
subject: Qurʼan—Commentaries—History—11th century—Sources
binding_note: Yellow paper over paper pasteboards for upper and lower covers. Spine and edges in brown leather. faded red-dyed paper pastedowns.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
